title: WEIRD LAG NOT ONLY IN LEAGUE OF LEGENDS
body:
So this has been happening for 1-2 months already i didnt give it much attention cause i thought it would just disappear by itself.I have a really weird lag happening in games like Diablo 3 or League Of Legends which consists of the following problem I have a ROCK STABLE 52-53 ping and between 100 and 400 FPS it never goes higher than that or lower but my game still doesnt play fluid at all.Ill give you some examples:
1.So let's say I last hit a minion I shloud get the gold immediately after killing it but i get it with a 2 seconds delay (it goes the same with the minion hp as I hit it I see how much hp I took after 2 secs)
2.I played a ranked game today and since the beggining i had some kind of lags they weren't high but still it was annoing as my ping was 52 all the game .I was fighting the enemy botlane but I didnt see the spells they were throwing at me example: Kalista used her Q and i saw the animation but in my screen I ACTUALLY DIDNT SEE THE SPEAR it took like 2 seconds to actually appear.
3.I was playing Diablo 3 and the same thing happend,i used my spell and my character did the animation of using it but it took 2 seconds for it to appear where it shloud be immediately.
4.Playing fortnite,I was shooting a guy and he was shooting me I had full hp and suddenly it went from 100 to 20 the guy shot me like 3-4 times in the chest but I didnt realize it cause my hp didnt go down as he was shooting me,but it went down in 2-3 seconds from 100 to 20 and no he didnt headshot me or smth like that.
I've made a ping test with CMD and speedtest.net and these are the results
1.CMD - PING MINIMUM - 16ms PING MAXIMUM - 32ms 
SENT PACKETS  - 100 RECIEVED - 99 LOST - 1 
2.Speedtest.net - PING 20 DOWNLOAD - 18.27 Mbps UPLOAD - 5.48 Mbps LOST PACKETS - 0
So I have no idea what the problem would be ...my GPU is updated and I have never experienced this problem before as I said it started happening 1-2 months ago.The first week I restarted the router and the modem and it worked but not for long...now even the reset doesnt help.BTW I'm connected by cable(Modem to router and router to PC)
MODEM - ARRIS CM820 Cable Modem
GPU - GTX 960 
CPU - i5 6400
RAM - 8GB
{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: It sounds like you're getting spikes potentially caused by packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on those games to get us an overview, and let me know what you find.
